channel.title: spain on Miro's World
channel.description: Recent content in spain on Miro's World

item.title: Pyrenees
item.description: Finally, we got to visit the mountains in the North - Pyrenees. Specifically this place: https://benasque.com/en Short version I liked it. Great hikes, very good food. Excellent hotel Long version

item.title: Spanish and Catalan
item.description: The current weather in Valencia summed up: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j2VHUP7R2CY Note for my friends who think Catalan is more or less same as Spanish: go for it and translate :-)

item.title: Tim Hortons in Valencia
item.description: I have my doubts whether it will survive. It is next to Starbucks (one of several, albeit nothing like Toronto) so there is competition for tourists looking for the familiar logo. As for locals, Spanish coffee culture is quite different, and if I am allowed to say so - Spanish coffee is both better AND less expensive as So let’s hope Timbits will save the day. Who could resist deep fried sugary dough, eh ?

item.title: AWS Summit Madrid
item.description: One day round trip Valencia to Madrid and back. It is 350 km, but AVE (high velocity train) makes it in 1.5 hr. Take that, Via Rail !! Travelling at 300 km/h is unreal. It is actually quieter and more smooth than Canadian train at 80 - all that makes the speed believable is the velocity display and view out of the window when train goes around something closer to the rails.
